note.p: German zoologist. Studied medicine at the Royal Medical Surgical Friedrich-Wilhelm Institute, Berlin; MD, Königsberg, 1861. Keeper, Greifswald Zoological Museum, 1864. Habilitated in zoology at Greifswald in 1865. Medical doctor and naturalist on the second German polar expedition, 1869–70; described the Crustacea collected on the expedition. Professor extraordinarius of zoology, Greifswald, 1872–5; professor, 1876.
